setup.legs_description: Long 100 shares with short OTM/ATM call to reduce cost basis and cap upside.
setup.description: Long 100 shares with short OTM/ATM call to reduce cost basis and cap upside.

management_mechanics.profit_taking: 50% of collected credit or ~21 DTE roll/close.
management_mechanics.defense: Call ITM: Roll up and out (higher strike, later date) for a Net Credit.
management_mechanics.rolling: Stock Drops: Roll the Call down to generate more credit, but avoid locking in loss.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Roll short call 21-28 DTE for credit; avoid rolling below breakeven.

metadata.max_profit: Credit received + stock gains up to short call strike.
metadata.max_loss: Stock purchase price - call credit (downside to zero).
metadata.breakeven: Stock cost basis - call credit.

setup.legs_description: Bullish defined-risk debit: buy ITM/ATM call, sell higher strike call.
setup.description: Bullish defined-risk debit: buy ITM/ATM call, sell higher strike call.

management_mechanics.defense: Generally do nothing. Defined risk.
management_mechanics.rolling: Rarely roll. If IV crushes, maybe.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Defined risk; usually close rather than roll.

metadata.breakeven: Long call strike + net debit.

setup.legs_description: Synthetic long stock: buy 2 ITM calls, sell 1 ATM/near ATM call to remove extrinsic.
setup.description: Synthetic long stock: buy 2 ITM calls, sell 1 ATM/near ATM call to remove extrinsic.

management_mechanics.profit_taking: 25-50% of debit or stock-like move toward short strike.
management_mechanics.defense: Defined risk; do nothing.
management_mechanics.rolling: Close or roll structure if assumption holds.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Close or roll entire structure if assumption holds.

metadata.breakeven: Near long strike + any extrinsic debit.

setup.legs_description: LEAP ITM call + short near-term OTM/ATM call to mimic covered call with lower capital.
setup.description: LEAP ITM call + short near-term OTM/ATM call to mimic covered call with lower capital.

management_mechanics.defense: Short ITM: Roll out to next cycle to reduce basis.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Continuously roll short call for credit; keep long 9-12 months out.

metadata.max_profit: Width between strikes minus net debit plus remaining long extrinsic.
metadata.breakeven: Long strike + net debit - short call credit.

setup.legs_description: Buy longer-dated call, sell near-term call same strike; neutral to mildly bullish vol play.
setup.description: Buy longer-dated call, sell near-term call same strike; neutral to mildly bullish vol play.

management_mechanics.defense: Short ITM: Roll out to next cycle to reduce basis.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Roll short call out if near expiry and long still holds value.

metadata.breakeven: Near strike after front-month decay; roughly short strike +/- portion of debit.

setup.legs_description: Defined-risk, low-probability bullish pin: long call spread plus short call spread sharing body.
setup.description: Defined-risk, low-probability bullish pin: long call spread plus short call spread sharing body.

management_mechanics.defense: Do not roll tested side. Roll untested wing closer.
management_mechanics.rolling: Hold through expiration or close at stop.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Close before expiration to avoid assignment; rarely roll.

metadata.max_profit: Width of long spread - debit paid at body strike.
metadata.breakeven: Lower wing + debit; upper wing - debit.

setup.legs_description: ATM short put + short call vertical same body; credit > call spread width to remove upside risk.
setup.description: ATM short put + short call vertical same body; credit > call spread width to remove upside risk.

management.stop_loss_description: Downside: Manage like Naked Put (2x credit stop or roll). Upside: No risk.

management_mechanics.defense: Put ITM: Roll out or roll call spread down. Call ITM: Do nothing.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Roll put/convert to defined risk if needed; keep credit > call spread width.

metadata.max_loss: Downside: short put strike minus credit (stock-like). Upside capped only if credit < call spread width.
metadata.breakeven: Short put strike - credit received.

setup.legs_description: Short 100 shares with short OTM/ATM put to reduce cost basis and cap downside gains.
setup.description: Short 100 shares with short OTM/ATM put to reduce cost basis and cap downside gains.

management_mechanics.profit_taking: 50% of collected credit or ~21 DTE roll/close.
management_mechanics.defense: ITM: Roll down and out for credit. Stock Rises: Roll up.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Roll short put 21-28 DTE for credit; avoid rolling above breakeven.

metadata.max_profit: Credit received + stock drop to short put strike.
metadata.max_loss: Unlimited upside on short stock offset by put credit.
metadata.breakeven: Short stock entry - put credit.

setup.legs_description: Buy ATM/OTM put, sell two further OTM puts for a net credit/debit; bullish-to-neutral with downside tail risk.
setup.description: Buy ATM/OTM put, sell two further OTM puts for a net credit/debit; bullish-to-neutral with downside tail risk.

management_mechanics.defense: Tested short: Roll naked unit out or close. Tested long: Hold.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Roll out/convert to defined risk before deep ITM.

metadata.max_profit: Long vertical value at short strike (width) minus any debit; grows toward short strike.
metadata.max_loss: Naked short unit below lower short strike (the extra short put).
metadata.breakeven: Lower short strike minus net credit/debit effect.

setup.legs_description: Buy ATM/OTM call, sell two further OTM calls for a net credit/debit; bearish-to-neutral with upside tail risk.
setup.description: Buy ATM/OTM call, sell two further OTM calls for a net credit/debit; bearish-to-neutral with upside tail risk.

metadata.max_profit: Long vertical value at short strike (width) minus any debit; grows toward short strike.
metadata.max_loss: Naked short unit above upper short strike (the extra short call).
metadata.breakeven: Upper short strike plus net credit/debit effect.

setup.legs_description: Asymmetric put butterfly skewed to collect small credit or cheap debit; prefers pin near body.
setup.description: Asymmetric put butterfly skewed to collect small credit or cheap debit; prefers pin near body.

management_mechanics.defense: Defined risk; usually do nothing. If tested, roll short strike out.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: If tested, roll toward symmetric fly for small debit; otherwise close.

metadata.max_profit: Credit/debit-defined: maximum near body; if for credit, keep credit when all OTM.
metadata.max_loss: Wider wing width minus credit (on the broken side).
metadata.breakeven: Upper wing - credit; body +/- net debit/credit depending on structure.

setup.legs_description: Asymmetric call butterfly skewed to collect small credit or cheap debit; prefers pin near body.

metadata.breakeven: Lower wing + credit; body +/- net debit/credit depending on structure.

setup.description: Disconnected call BWB (long call spread, wider short call spread) routed for credit to widen profit zone.

management_mechanics.defense: Defined risk; usually do nothing. If tested, roll short strike out.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Close or reshape; assignment-sensitive.

metadata.max_profit: Long call spread value + credit from short wider spread.
metadata.max_loss: Net width difference minus credit (if routed for credit).
metadata.breakeven: Near long spread wings; depends on widths/credit.

setup.legs_description: Sell OTM call and OTM put; neutral, short vol premium play.
setup.description: Sell OTM call and OTM put; neutral, short vol premium play.

management_mechanics.defense: Roll untested side closer (e.g. 30 Delta). If < 21 DTE, roll both legs out.
management_mechanics.rolling: Roll for credit. If inverted, look to scratch.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Roll challenged side for credit; manage before/at 21 DTE.

metadata.breakeven: Put strike - credit; call strike + credit.

setup.description: Sell ATM call and ATM put; high-theta, high-gamma neutral premium sell.

management_mechanics.profit_taking: 25-50% of credit (faster exit due to gamma).
management_mechanics.defense: Roll untested side. Manage gamma early.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Roll challenged side/body for credit; manage before/at 21 DTE.

metadata.breakeven: Strike +/- credit.

setup.legs_description: Defined-risk short strangle using OTM put and call credit spreads.
setup.description: Defined-risk short strangle using OTM put and call credit spreads.
setup.probability_of_profit: 60% to 80% The stock stays between our strikes as time passes. This results in extrinsic value decay on both sides and the trade can be bought back for a profit over time.

management_mechanics.defense: Roll untested spread closer (turn into Iron Fly).
management_mechanics.rolling: Do not roll out in time unless credit > 10% of width. Usually close.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Defined risk; usually close rather than roll unless for small credit.

metadata.win_rate: 60% to 80% The stock stays between our strikes as time passes. This results in extrinsic value decay on both sides and the trade can be bought back for a profit over time.
metadata.breakeven: Put spread short strike - credit; call spread short strike + credit.

setup.legs_description: Iron condor with asymmetric wing widths sized to skew risk/credit.
setup.description: Iron condor with asymmetric wing widths sized to skew risk/credit.
setup.probability_of_profit: 60% to 80% 1 Sell an OTM put spread 2 Sell an OTM call spread The stock stays between our strikes as time passes. This results in extrinsic value decay on both sides, and the trade can be bought back for a profit over time.

management_mechanics.defense: Roll untested spread closer (turn into Iron Fly).
management_mechanics.rolling: Do not roll out in time unless credit > 10% of width. Usually close.
management_mechanics.roll_guidance: Defined risk; usually close rather than roll unless for small credit.

metadata.win_rate: 60% to 80% 1 Sell an OTM put spread 2 Sell an OTM call spread The stock stays between our strikes as time passes. This results in extrinsic value decay on both sides, and the trade can be bought back for a profit over time.
metadata.breakeven: Put short - credit; call short + credit (adjusted for widths).

metadata.breakeven: Body strike +/- (wing width - credit).
